title: Identity Case Study
body: Travel0 is a company that allows customers to book travel experiences. They would like customers to be able to create accounts so that they can easily check out with saved information. Their primary goal is to implement a seamless signup and login experience in order to minimize friction. In addition, they would like to source customer identities from multiple providers including social login via Google and Facebook. That way, their customers can easily use an existing account instead of the hassle of creating a new one just for their site. Finally, they want enhanced security with multi-factor authentication and attack protection.

title: What Is Identity?
body:
The most basic identity scenario is when a user, who could be a human or a digital entity, wants to access a resource of some kind.

A digital identity is the set of attributes that define a user in the context of a specific application. Authentication is the process of the person (or machine) proving they are who they say they are. One typical example of authentication is using a username and password to log in to a website.

CIAM stands for Customer Identity and Access Management, the application of digital identity to business use-cases. Travel0 needs a CIAM solution in order to maintain the information they need about their customers securely while at the same time allowing their customers to access their own information and data through their web app.

title: Accordion
body: Digital identity is not a one-size-fits-all proposition. Depending on the use-case, a digital identity may be comprised of different attributes.
instruction: Click the tabs below to learn about different forms of digital identity.

_items.title: Travel0
_items.body:
A customer's identity consists of the following pieces of information:

  • Name
  • Email
  • Credit card number
  • Billing address

_items.title: Department of Motor Vehicles
_items.body:
A customer's digital identity in a given state may include:

  • Resident's name
  • Home address
  • Driver's license number
  • Government identity number

_items.title: Medical Office
_items.body:
A customer's digital identity consists of:

  • Name
  • Date of birth
  • Patient's unique ID number
  • Insurance information
  • And any other relevant information
